snippet: Customers who buy subscriptions to People magazine and The New York Times will receive discounts on Nooks, as the bookseller looks to increase sales.
abstract: Customers who buy subscriptions to People magazine and The New York Times will receive discounts on Nooks, as the bookseller looks to increase sales.
lead_paragraph: Barnes & Noble, in a move to increase sales of its Nook devices, will offer deep discounts on them to customers who also buy subscriptions to the Nook editions of People magazine or The New York Times, the retailer is expected to announce on Monday.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble to Offer Nook Discount to Subscribers of 2 Publications
